name: Dam
description: Dam is a computer version of checkers. The available modes include: human vs. human, human vs. computer, or computer vs. computer. The features include: online play, different difficulty levels (corresponding to giving the computer different time limits to think), setting up the board layout, support of files in the PDN (Portable Draughts Notation) format.
alsoFor: Palm OS, Windows, Windows 3.x | Combined View
